name: 2020 Count Down
description: This is a countdown app special for 2020. It keeps track of how many days, hours, minutes and seconds left in 2020. It allows you to write messages to the app so that when the year 2020 is finally over, you can discard and delete app along with the year 2020! As well as any ill forthcoming. Forget 2020 and be ready for 2021! Open this app at least one minute before the new year countdown to allow the app to help you end the year with a bang! Good luck in 2021! Auld Lang Syne!  **USE THE QUIT BUTTON TO SAVE THE TEXT**
